text: Vy budete panuvaty sered nykh z路hidno z BOZHYMY vidkryttyamy do vas. Ne proslidkuyte za yikhnimy bazhannyamy, ta beware lest vony vidvodyat使 vas z deyakykh z BOZHYKH vidkryttiv do vas. Yakshcho vony prohanyayut使, todi znayut使 shcho BOH wills shchob pokaraty yikh dlya deyakykh z yikhnikh hrikhiv. Diysno, bahato lyudey ye bezputni
